long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of scrolling through your stream without any customization in place?

With the DeBank helper extension, you can now sort the Hot stream by the creation date and stay on top of the latest happenings.

Looking for a rewarding pool? Simply sort articles accordingly.

Fed up with countless and meaningless posts from Official Accounts? Filter them out.

Want to catch up on the most popular posts from the people you follow, but your "Following" stream is too cluttered? There's a filter that does that for you.

Tired of reposts? Turn them off.

Don't want to see some specific words? Blacklist them.

Check for other features and the progress in the changelog:
https://github.com/vermi321/debank-extension/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md
